00025 #include "util/Util.h"
00026 
00027 #define B_FMT "%12llu  "
00028 #define B_CVT(x) ((long long unsigned int)x)
00029 #define M_FMT "%10.3fMB  "
00030 #define M_CVT(x) (x/(1024.0*1024))
00031 
00032 int
00033 main(int argc,char* argv[])
00034 {
00035   uint64_t free;
00036   uint64_t total;
00037   uint64_t swapAvail;
00038   uint64_t memAvail;
00039 
00040 #ifdef __linux__
00041   if (argc==2) {
00042     printf("Reading linux /proc/meminfo from '%s' for testing:\n",argv[1]);
00043     memInfo_linux(argv[1],free,total,swapAvail,memAvail);
00044   } else {
00045     Util::memInfo(free,total,swapAvail,memAvail,false);
00046   }
00047 #else
00048   Util::memInfo(free,total,swapAvail,memAvail,false);
00049 #endif
00050 
00051   printf("meminfo: free=" B_FMT "total=" B_FMT "swapAvail=" B_FMT "memAvail=" B_FMT "\n",
00052          B_CVT(free),B_CVT(total),B_CVT(swapAvail),B_CVT(memAvail));
00053   printf("meminfo: free=" M_FMT "total=" M_FMT "swapAvail=" M_FMT "memAvail=" M_FMT "\n",
00054          M_CVT(free),M_CVT(total),M_CVT(swapAvail),M_CVT(memAvail));
00055 
00056 // and again with a cap
00057 
00058 #ifdef __linux__
00059   if (argc==2) {
00060     printf("Reading linux /proc/meminfo from '%s' for testing:\n",argv[1]);
00061     memInfo_linux(argv[1],free,total,swapAvail,memAvail);
00062   } else {
00063     Util::memInfo(free,total,swapAvail,memAvail,true);
00064   }
00065 #else
00066   Util::memInfo(free,total,swapAvail,memAvail,true);
00067 #endif
00068 
00069   printf("meminfo (cap): free=" B_FMT "total=" B_FMT "swapAvail=" B_FMT "memAvail=" B_FMT "\n",
00070          B_CVT(free),B_CVT(total),B_CVT(swapAvail),B_CVT(memAvail));
00071   printf("meminfo (cap): free=" M_FMT "total=" M_FMT "swapAvail=" M_FMT "memAvail=" M_FMT "\n",
00072          M_CVT(free),M_CVT(total),M_CVT(swapAvail),M_CVT(memAvail));
00073 
00074   return 0;
00075 }
